comments: Also the dimension of the space of cusp forms of weight two on Gamma1(n) [From _Steven Finch_, Apr 03 2009]
references: F. Hirzebruch et al., Manifolds and Modular Forms, Vieweg, 2nd ed. 1994, p. 161.

maple: with(numtheory); A029937 := proc(n) local i,j; j := 1+(1/24)*phi(n)*A001615(n); for i in divisors(n) do j := j-(1/4)*phi(i)*phi(n/i) od; j; end;
mathematica: a[n_ /; n<5] = 0; a[n_] := 1+Sum[d^2*MoebiusMu[n/d]/24 - EulerPhi[d]*EulerPhi[n/d]/4, {d, Divisors[n]}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 13 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
